reviews.text: On the evening of the 11th Sept 19, i had arrived at Salisbury expecting to catch a train to Bath Spa then back up to Swindon, this train was very late and i would miss my connection and be stranded at Bath Spa, a member of Staff came over and ask where I was going and then with some help from other staff got me onto a Reading train to get me back in time, Fantastic Customer Service, Thank-you very much
Had a rather unpleasant encounter with the station boss (the guy in the blazer) very snappy and unnecessarily rude for simply asking a question, definitely needs to be sorted out.

Incredibly polite and helpful staff! Everyone at the gates are very polite and friendly! Especially young gentleman named James who works by the gates! Every evening he would greet me and ask me about my day! Also an older gentleman at the desk, didn’t catch his name, but he was a supervisor! He helped a lot with my ticket and a refund!

Went up to the counter to ask for some help and the staff barked ‘use the machine ‘ at me.

Very rude and unhelpful.
Staff are all helpful and do what they can
